scripts.test: npm run reset:db-test && node -e "setTimeout(() => {}, 1000)" && turbo run test
scripts.reset:db-test: docker compose -f docker-compose-test.yml up -d && node -e "setTimeout(() => {}, 1000)" && dotenv -e .env.test -- prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.build:tests-cache: node -e "const { performance } = require('perf_hooks'); const start = performance.now(); require('child_process').execSync('npm run test && docker compose build', { stdio: 'inherit' }); const end = performance.now(); console.log(`Build completed in ${(end - start) / 1000} seconds`);"
scripts.build:tests-no-cache: node -e "const { performance } = require('perf_hooks'); const start = performance.now(); require('child_process').execSync('jest --clearCache && npm run test && docker compose build --no-cache', { stdio: 'inherit' }); const end = performance.now(); console.log(`Build completed in ${(end - start) / 1000} seconds`);"
scripts.deploy:no-tests-cache: time -p sh -c 'docker compose build; docker compose up -d'
scripts.deploy:no-tests-no-cache: time -p sh -c 'docker compose build --no-cache; docker compose up -d'
scripts.deploy:tests-cache: time -p sh -c 'npm run test; docker compose build; docker compose up -d'
scripts.deploy:tests-no-cache: time -p sh -c 'npm run test; docker compose build --no-cache; docker compose up -d'
